description.value:
You are skilled at fighting with double-bladed weapons. While you are wielding a weapon with the double property with which you are proficient, you gain the following benefits:

  • When you engage in Double-Weapon Fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the attack roll of your Double-Weapon Fighting attack.
  • When you attempt to shove a creature, instead of making a Strength (Athletics) check, you can instead make an attack roll. If you are wielding your weapon in two hands, you make this attack roll with advantage.
